participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, she enjoys games and prefers the fun side of life over school.
participant_1.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i hate school. i do not have many friends.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Active and friendly, he enjoys staying fit and has a casual approach to life.
participant_2.background: i've short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored.

content.text: Do you have short or long hair?
